name: Character Interview
description:
A game to act

Sharpen your improvisation skills while having fun! The computer give you replica so you can bring your characters to life while your webcam records your performance. Create thrilling stories, be whoever you want, and above all have fun!

A police interrogation or a first meeting with your in-laws are some of the scenarios provided that you can play.
But you also have the possibility of writing your own cue games that the program will read to you to make you react.

Current state :

  • Currently only available on Windows.
  • It is still in early development.  Currently only English and French are supported.
  • Require to install Text to Speech voices of windows if it is not already present.

Features that should be added in the future :

  • More languages supported
  • More stocks interview templates
  • Possibility to add sound, image, video and visual effects to interview template
  • Linux and Mac version
  • ...
